snippet.title: Striving for Light - Devouring Darkness Update
snippet.description:
~ Coming to Early Access on 29. Nov 2021 ~ ► https://store.steampowered.com/app/1646790/Striving_for_Light/
~ Play the free alpha on ~ ► https://ignitingsparkgames.itch.io/strivingforlight
~ Get involved and join our Discord ~ ► https://discord.com/invite/GNEBkQDyUb

~ More information ~ ► https://www.strivingforlight.com/

~ About the game ~
Striving for Light is a rogue-lite ARPG where you utilise a unique infinite expanding skilltree to fight your way through the darkness, striving for light.
